Also mal ganz ehrlich das Spiel ist der der Hammer :D also der Herzschlag geht bei mir immer in den tausender bereich.Was Adrenalin angeht ist das Spiel, die richtige Droge für.Das spiel Prinzipist zwar einfach gehalten und man denkt es möge auf längere Zeit langweilig werden aber nein stimmt sowas von nicht ,durch die ganzen neuen Updates bleibt es immer Interressant und auch an sich man spielt es irgendwie immer wieder und wieder.Für Adrenalin Junkies und Horror Game Freaks definitive Kauf Empfehlung =)

[b] Bello, ma si potrebbe migliorare! [/b]

Il gioco si suddivide in "Sopravvissuti" e "killer", il compito dei sopravvissuti è, una volta esser stati catapultati sulla mappa di gioco, attivare i vari generatori posti su essa, per l'esattezza ne servono 5 (la mappa per ovvie ragioni quali scongiurare il camping ne contiene circa 7), per attivare la corrente che alimenta i due cancelli di uscita, i quali poi dovranno esser successivamente aperti.

É un gioco che si basa su skill checks, in quasi tutte le azioni dovremmo semplicemente tener premuto il tasto (M1 di default) e successivamente premere (Space Bar di default) durante il completamento dell'azione per fermare una barra all'interno di un'area di un cerchio che verrà posto sopra alla barra di progresso dell'azione; il tutto introdotto da suono classico, a meno che il killer non stia usando un'abilità speciale. In caso di fallimento di skill check, il killer verrà notificato tramite un'esplosione sulla mappa.

 Il compito del killer è quello di impedire la fuga dei sopravvissuti sfamando l'entità, un mostro mistico che si manifesta sottoforma di chele. Vi sono due modi nei quali puà compiere ciò, appendendo ai ganci i sopravvissuti, che potranno esser salvati fino a due volte dal gancio, a patto che non vi stiano troppo entrando in una delle 3 fasi, oppure con le proprie mani, tramite un'offerta particolare, che però lo consente solo dopo aver appeso almeno una volta il sopravvissuto in questione.

 Il gioco sarebbe molto bello, consigliato con gli amici per motivi che elencherò successivamente. Ciò che rovina il gioco sono bug e community, il gioco è pieno di bug, per quanto vasto di mappe e killer, ognuno ha un proprio bug, come curve con angolazioni improponibili da parte dei tragitti con motosega del "mandriano", hitbox messe male o semplicemente azioni mal compiute.

 La sezione community invece include: commenti tossici, killer che rimangono dall'uncino mentere un sopravvissuto vi è appeso, impedendone il salvataggio (può esser contrastato dai sopravvissuti facendo i generatori indisturbatamente siccome il killer starà in quella zona); le partite sono hostate dal killer, ciò significa che laggherà a seconda della connessione di quest'ultimo, per fortuna col nuovo aggiornamento, è possibile vedere il pign dei sopravvissuti e del killer, di modo da poter facilmente evitare partite spiacevoli semplicemente cambiando lobby.
Il gioco è arricchito dalla possibilità di comprare abilità oggetti e offerte dagli effetti differenti tramite "la tela sanguinaria", un insieme di elementi generati a caso acquistabili con i punti ottenuti in gioco. 


Il gioco è dunque consigliato a patto che siate persone pazienti a causa delle molteplici disavventure che potreste avere...
Consigliato giocare con amici per formare squadre di sopravvissuti di modo da evitare persone nella propria partita le quali non forniscano aiuto o collaborino con il killer.

Playing the game since day one I can say: They've ruined the game with every new patch that came after the Huntress. Sure, the new maps always look nice, there are lots of skins (I remember the good 'ol days where you had to buy a DLC for ~6 new cosmetics for one of the characters and that's it) and the graphics update looks neat!

But the whole experience is another from what this game used to be.
- Lots of buggy and super weird new animations
- the brightness increase from sowhere around 2017 destroyed a lot of the feeling
- bugs from 2016 are still not fixed
- the whole new HUD looks so bad. Like seriously. Who thought this was a good idea when it already looked good?
- killer updates which made them unfun to play
- survivor updates which made them unfun to play
- a battle pass that takes  f o r e v e r  to complete + the rewards from them went quality wise free falling from the first rift to the second and so on. Weird recolors and then it's not even the full set? dfq? And tooooooons auf charms nobody bets an eye on
- the gameplay is simply repetitive and most of the time just super slow and not even scary. Feels more like a job to play the game than doing it for fun.

As a new player you might have fun for a while but you'll realise, that the game gets boring fast. Really fast.
And since almost everything is locked behind a paywall and events get stuffed into a 3 months rift, there is literally no goal, no limited time event or whatsoever anymore. the ones there were (summer bbq, lunar new year, halloween, etc.) had the same concept each time around but atleast they were different.

All I can say is, look for another game if you just want a good scare or a fun long time experience.
Because all you can find here is a game where you have to spend extra money if you want some challenges that give you actuall rewards + devs which never listened to the playerbase or feedback once in soon five years of Dead by Daylight.

Co mogę powiedzieć polecam ale przygotujcie sobie jakieś pieniądze na dlc: )

La verdad, no me esperaba demasiado, pero aprovechando las ofertas de primavera le di una oportunidad y no me arrepiento de absolutamente nada.
 Entretenidísimo juego "must-have" en biblioteca para jugar con amigos, donde más que sustos te llevás unas risas y, aunque estés jugando solo, se la pasa excelente.
 Un juego donde o sos la víctima o el victimario, al menos darle una oportunidad que no la van a desperdiciar. Re contra recomendado.
It's okay I guess.

Наиграв в эту игру несколько часов, я понял, что игра полная параша. Сейчас объясню почему!
1)КОМЬЮНИТИ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!ПОЛНАЯ XYINЯ;
2)1 ранг маньяк и 17-20 ранги сурвы, просто маньяк бегает по всей карте с 4-мя перками и просто уничтожает всех и вся, в итоге игра заканчиваеться за 6-11 минут;
3)ПОСЛЕ КАЖДОГО ОБНОВЛЕНИЯ НЕ МОГУ ПОДКЛЮЧИТСЯ В ЛОББИ К ДРУЗЬЯМ И ЭТО БЕСИТ БОЛЬШЕ ВСЕГО!!!
4)БАГИ,ПИНГ,МАНЬЯК С ИНТЕРНЕТОМ 0.0000000000001 КБ/С. И ПОСЛЕ ИГРЫ ГОВОРИТ, ЧТО МОЛ Я НЕ ВИНОВАТ ЭТО У ВАС ДЕРЬМОВЫЙ ИНТЕРНЕТ.
МОЖЕТ КТО-ТО НОВИЧОК И СЕЙЧАС ЧИТАЕШЬ ЭТОТ ОБЗОР: ЛИВАЙТЕ ИЗ ЛОББИ ЕСЛИ ВИДЕТЕ, ЧТО ПИНГ БОЛЬШЕ 300 (ПОСМОТРЕТЬ МОЖНА В ПРАВОМ НИНЕМ УГЛУ ВОЗЛЕ ЧАТА), ИГРА НЕ БУДЕТ УДАЧНОЙ Я ВАС УВЕРЯЮ.
НЕ СТОИТ ТРАТИТЬ НА НЕЁ ДЕНЬГИ.
10/10 ВЫЛЕТОВ ИЗ ЛОББИ.

Игра уже как 3 года на рынке,но как всегда она может и удивить и заставить вас злиться,только потому что есть люди которые не умеют играть.ав игре есть опытные сурвы, которые пишут маньяку новичку что он лох,не умеет играть,ez,gg wp и т.д. и такие люди меня немного бесят,когда ман к примеру имеет 1 перк а сурвы имеют только самохилы ножи спринтеры и т.д. это называеться баланс?

Минусы:Дизбаласн,копирование аккаунтов(сейвов) можно легко накрутить или взломать игру,система эмблем она немного дебильная,багоюзерство,разрешены:тунелерство и фейс кемп,дорогие DLC администрация иногда не реагирует на жалобы,в игре есть психованые люди.

Плюсы:Иногда бывают смешные баги,всплывающие подсказки новичкам,игра хорошо оптимизована графика на хорошем уровне,геймплей уникальный,интересная система прокачки персонажа,уникальные способности персонажев это добавляет разнообразие в игру,есть прикольные фишки,скрытая кастомизация для персонажей,можно выбить скины с помощью стримов,есть привелегии в игре такие как стример и ютубер,в DLC есть персонажи с фильмов,есть уникальные способности убийц,иногда есть ивенты в которых есть скины.

Dead by Daylight is a wonderfuly horrifiying game that everyone needs to try!

"Dead by Daylight"... 
Die Entwickler sollen sich mal um ihr scheiß Spiel kümmern und dafür sorgen, dass es funktioniert. "Dead by Daylight" ist kein Spiel was keine Bugs hat, es ist ein Bug bei dem ausversehen ein Spiel herausgekommen ist. 
Es ist das einzige Spiel dass es geschafft hat, dass ich meinen Kontroller durch das Zimmer geworfen habe, und das nicht wegen meiner eigenen Inkompetenz, was durchaus manchmal auch der Fall für eine schlechte Runde ist, sondern weil das Spiel einfach nicht funktioniert. 
Du holst jemanden vom Hacken, er spawnt 10 Sekunden später wieder an derselben Stelle. 
Du versteckst dich vom Killer, läufst ihn gekonnt aus dem Weg und spawnst direkt vor dem Killer während du auf dem Weg zum Ausgang bist.
Du willst dich vor dem Killer verstecken? Vergesse es. Du bleibst wie von Zauberhand an einem verdammten Baum kleben und kommst nicht mehr von der Stelle. 
Und das herum hüpfen auf der Karte, was einfach das Spiel noch viel spaßiger (NICHT!) macht, liegt auch nicht an meinem PC oder an meiner Internetleitung. Es ist einfach dieses Spiel, dass es nicht auf die Reihe bekommt endlich mal zu funktionieren.
Man kann sagen, wenn DbD ein Update macht wird ein Bug gefixt und zwei neue kommen hinzu. 

Edit:
Da das Spiel mitlerweile sich sehr gut gemacht hat werde ich diese Review von "Negativ" auf "Positiv" setzen

Im Grunde ist das Game sehr gut gelungen ! 
Die Macher haben sich natürlich viel Mühe gegeben, denn im Detail macht das Game echt was her!
So als kleiner Grusel Part mit seinen Freunden macht es für mehrere Runden aber Spaß ! ;-)

Wenn man es auf Dauer spielt, wird es meiner Meinung nach etwas langweilig, da es keine Abwechslung bietet! 
Warum ? 
--> Als Killer, der Name sagt es schon aus, muss man die Überlebenden fangen und töten, bzw abhalten die Generatoren zu Reparieren und zu flüchten. 
--> Genauso als Überlebender das Gegenteil! Generatoren reparieren und versuchen vom Killer zu flüchten.

Im Groben ist es ein Routine Game .. meiner MEINUNG !

THE REVERTTT

Now that I have gotten some time in on this game, I feel I can review it properly.  

Pros:  
-Intense game play for those looking for a fun hide-and-seek-esque game with objectives. 
-Replayability, to an extent.  
-Good Killer design that does justice to movie villains we all know and love.  Especially like the Leatherface model and how they made it so close to the 1970s version of the killer.  
-Can level up one survivor to max and then keep using to put points into another survivor or killer.  
-Pretty balanced gameplay.  Some tough perks and killer combos to deal with but not everything should be insta-winnable.  If your team bails on you, you still usually have an option to cary yourself to a victory.  

Cons:
-Graphics are nothing special but can run on a budget PC well at least.  I hope the game is updated with better or mmore interesting textures as time goes on.
-Sometimes glitchy mechanics or gfx like on Megs hair.  The hitboxes are a bit wonky sometimes and is reminiscent of a CS:S game.  
-Ping makes for a lackluster experience and find myself dodging queue until I get someone hosting on my side of the country, and that can take some time.
-Bloodpoint grinding can be annoying if you don't get lucky with 100k point dailies, have 7+ 30k or less quests in a row.
-Steep learning curve makes you feel useless until you start to understand what all the perks do.  

So far with about 100 hours of actual playtune I have only managed to get to rank 10 and my progress is slowing.  
I have taken 2 survivors to 50 so far and two more to 20 and 30.

Love/Hate relationship
g

I like games with a good stealth mechanic, and that normally ends up being in singleplayer games. The problem with singleplayer stealth games is the NPCs you hide from have an AI that you end up familarizing, even on the hardest difficulty.
This multiplayer game actually has a very good stealth mechanic if you choose to be stealthy.

The perks you use in this game will help you advance and achive your desired playstyle. Like I said before, mine is stealth, but there are other playstyles you can aim for. Some others include getting objectives done at a faster rate. Some perks support your teammates when they are nearby.

It's a great game for just $20 and the community isn't bad either. I say that because you can't type to your teammates during gameplay (only before and after the match starts). You can of course voice with your friends in other voice programs, which is great!
one of the best games i've ever played!
